Transparent conducting oxides cited by_.title: Accelerating F-doping in transparent conducting F-doped SnO2 films for electrochromic energy storage devices
Transparent conducting oxides cited by_.abstract:
In this study, we designed a unique method for increasing F-doping concentration in F-
doped SnO 2 (FTO) films, without the extra addition of NH 4 F as a doping source, using …
